presentationTable.name: More Time Objects
presentationTable.description: This folder contains additional time attributes like Calendar time attributes, Fiscal time attributes, Julian period numbers and so on.

presentationColumns.name: T24  First Day Dt in Period

localization.localizationKey: T24  First Day Dt in Period

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T24  First Day Dt in Period
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Stores the date information in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Eg :- 2005-11-01

presentationColumns.name: T25  Last Day Dt in Period

localization.localizationKey: T25  Last Day Dt in Period

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T25  Last Day Dt in Period
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Stores the date information in the format YYYY-MM-DD. Eg :- 2005-11-01

presentationColumns.name: T6 ------------------------------------------
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

presentationColumns.name: T62  # of Days
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T62  # of Days
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Period Name Week. Stores the week information in the format YYYY Week Number. Eg :- 2005 Week 44

presentationColumns.name: T63  # of Weeks
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T63  # of Weeks
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of weeks within the period chosen.

presentationColumns.name: T64  # of Months
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T64  # of Months
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of months within the period chosen.

presentationColumns.name: T65  # of Qtrs
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T65  # of Qtrs
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of quarters within the period chosen.

presentationColumns.name: T66  # of Years
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T66  # of Years
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Shows the number of years within the period chosen.

presentationColumns.name: T67 Avg Days in Mth
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.F90 Time Facts.T67 Avg Days in Mth
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Days in Mth stores the number of days in that month. It could either be 30,31,28 or 29.

presentationColumns.name: T11 Day Of Week
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T11 Day Of Week
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Day of Week is a value between 1 and 7.

presentationColumns.name: T12 Day Of Month
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T12 Day Of Month
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Day of Month is a value between 1 and 31.

presentationColumns.name: T15 Day Of Year
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T15 Day Of Year
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Day of Year is a value between 1 and 366.

presentationColumns.name: T2 ------------------------------------------
presentationColumns.description:
Help :
Header object, dummy not to be used in any queries

presentationColumns.name: T26 Days in Mth
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T26 Days in Mth
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Days in Mth stores the number of days in that month. It could either be 30,31,28 or 29.

presentationColumns.name: T27 Days in Qtr
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T27 Days in Qtr
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Days in Qtr stores the number of days in that quarter. It could either be 90,91 or 92.

presentationColumns.name: T28 Holiday
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
This column indicates if the particular date is a holiday or not. The value is either 0 or 1.

presentationColumns.name: T99 Total Value (Hier)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:01 - Sample App.D0 Time.T99 Total Value (Hier)
presentationColumns.description:
Help : 
Period Name Month: Stores the year information in the format YYYY / MM.
Eg:- 2009 / 01
